title: MLS Cup final: Inter Miami v Vancouver Whitecaps – live
summary: Inter Miami is set to compete against the Vancouver Whitecaps in the MLS Cup final. Fans can follow the live action minute-by-minute reported by Beau Dure. The match promises to be an exciting showdown for the championship title.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week 11 – live
summary: This week's theme is Musicals Week, featuring songs from The Greatest Showman and West Side Story, along with a new Dance Relay segment. Competitors will showcase their talents in the quarter-finals. Viewers will be eager to see which performances dazzle and which receive criticism.

title: Leeds United 3-3 Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: The misfiring champions are visiting Elland Road for a crucial match. Scott Murray will provide live updates on the game's progress. Fans are eagerly anticipating how the team will perform in this challenge.

title: Africa Cup of Nations shunted into margins as greedy game finds no room at top table | Jonathan Wilson
summary: The Premier League's investment in its players is overshadowing the ability of Africa's top tournament to gain recognition. FIFA's superficial support is not enough to elevate the status of the tournament. As a result, African football continues to face challenges in achieving visibility and importance on the global stage.

title: Tanaka equaliser caps thrilling comeback as Leeds deny Liverpool
summary: Ao Tanaka scored a last-minute equaliser for Leeds, helping the team secure a dramatic 3-3 draw against Liverpool. Leeds rallied twice from behind during the match. The thrilling encounter showcased resilience from both sides.
